dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, um, some really tragic news coming out of India this week, right? Just, uh, absolutely heartbreaking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, um, some really tragic news coming out of India this week, right? Just, uh, absolutely heartbreaking.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the telegram addressed to Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi, President Tokayev expressed his deep condolences over the numerous human casualties resulting from the crash of a passenger plane near the airport of Ahmedabad.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, absolutely, Host_A. And we've seen, like, an immediate international response, actually. The President of Kazakhstan, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, he's already sent, uh, his deep condolences to Prime Minister Modi.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, absolutely, Host_A. And we've seen, like, an immediate international response, actually. The President of Kazakhstan, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, he's already sent, uh, his deep condolences to Prime Minister Modi.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has sent a telegram of condolences to the Prime Minister of India, citing Akorda. In the telegram addressed to Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi, President Tokayev expressed his deep condolences...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right. So, uh, what happened exactly? Like, the details are still coming out, but what do we know so far about this plane crash?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right. So, uh, what happened exactly? Like, the details are still coming out, but what do we know so far about this plane crash?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it was a passenger plane, an Air India Boeing 787 Dreamliner, actually. It was, um, en route from Ahmedabad to London.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it was a passenger plane, an Air India Boeing seven hundred eighty seven Dreamliner, actually. It was, um, en route from Ahmedabad to London.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 12, a Boeing¯787 Dreamliner operated by Air¯India, en route from Ahmedabad to London, crashed shortly after takeoff.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, Air India, Boeing 787. [interrupts] Okay, and it, it crashed, like, shortly after takeoff?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, Air India, Boeing seven hundred eighty seven. Okay, and it, it crashed, like, shortly after takeoff?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 12, a Boeing¯787 Dreamliner operated by Air¯India, en route from Ahmedabad to London, crashed shortly after takeoff.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely. Yeah, shortly after takeoff, near the airport there in Ahmedabad. And this is the really grim part, it reportedly crashed into, uh, a dormitory for doctors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely. Yeah, shortly after takeoff, near the airport there in Ahmedabad. And this is the really grim part, it reportedly crashed into, uh, a dormitory for doctors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to media reports, the aircraft crashed into a dormitory for doctors near the airport.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, a dormitory? For *doctors*? Oh my gosh. That’s just… [sighs] that's just adding to the tragedy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, a dormitory? For doctors? Oh my gosh. That's just... that's just adding to the tragedy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. It's, it's just awful. And, uh, apparently, before the crash, the plane *did* issue a Mayday distress signal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. It's, it's just awful. And, uh, apparently, before the crash, the plane did issue a Mayday distress signal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Before the crash, the Boeing issued a Mayday distress signal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A Mayday signal. And what about the crew? Like, the pilots?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A Mayday signal. And what about the crew? Like, the pilots?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the captain was very experienced, over 8,000 flight hours. The co-pilot, um, had about 1,100 hours. So, a lot of experience on board.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the captain was very experienced, over eight thousand flight hours. The co-pilot, um, had about eleven hundred hours. So, a lot of experience on board.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The captain had 8,200 flight hours, and the co-pilot had 1,100.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Gosh. It just makes you wonder, you know? Just, what a horrific, uh, turn of events.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Gosh. It just makes you wonder, you know? Just, what a horrific, uh, turn of events.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it really does. And Tokayev's telegram, it wasn't just condolences; he also sent words of support to the victims' families and wished a speedy recovery to anyone who was injured.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it really does. And Tokayev's telegram, it wasn't just condolences; he also sent words of support to the victims' families and wished a speedy recovery to anyone who was injured.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "The President of Kazakhstan conveyed words of support to the families of the victims and wished a speedy recovery to those injured in the air disaster," the Akorda statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's, that's really important. Just, um, showing that global solidarity in such a difficult time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's, that's really important. Just, um, showing that global solidarity in such a difficult time.

dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It’s, uh, a truly devastating situation.
